class.name: LineUnavailableException
class.comment:
A <code>LinenavailableException<code> is an exception indicating that a line annot be opened because it is unavailable. This situation arises most commonly when a line is requested when it is already in use by another application.
@author Kara Kytle
class.javadoc: A LineUnavailableException is an exception indicating that a line cannot be opened because it is unavailable. This situation arises most commonly when a requested line is already in use by another application. Kara Kytle 1.3
Constructs a LineUnavailableException that has null as its error detail message.
Constructs a LineUnavailableException that has the specified detail message. message a string containing the error detail message
